title: Submarine Warriors: The Enemy Beneath
description: The fathers of Caroline Connery and her friends mysteriously disappear during a top-secret submarine mission. Soon after, an anonymous text message reveals a government cover-up; their fathers had not died in an accident and might still be alive. Knowing she and her friends are the only hope to find the missing submariners, Caroline enlists the help of her grandfather, a retired Admiral. A daring submarine theft results in the entire Pacific fleet chasing down the kids with orders to sink them on sight. While rescuing their fathers, the kids' mission suddenly changes when they come face to face with the Underworlders. Now Caroline and her friends are all that stand in the way of these terrifying humanoid creatures and their plans to annihilate mankind. The battle for Earth begins underwater.
author: Rob Tiffany
